summary.para: Contains classes used in the Audit Trail Module.
The service that the Audit Trail Module uses to monitor object changes and log this information. You can use the static property to access this service and customize its behavior.
For internal use.
Handle this event to replace a default ObjectAuditProcessor for a particular object auditing mode with a custom processor.
Occurs after a business object is changed and before the corresponding AuditDataItem object is saved.
This event is raised when an application’s setup is complete. Handle this event to use the default settings for the Audit Trail Module.
For internal use.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.AuditTrail.AuditTrailService.Instance

summary.para: Provides access to the instance of the . Use this property to access AuditTrailService‘s settings.

member.value: The instance of the .

summary.para: Occurs before AuditDataItem objects are saved. Handle this event to get the current user name in applications that do not use the Security System.
Occurs before new AuditDataItem objects are saved to the database. Handle this event to configure how the Audit Trail Module saves information.
For internal use.
The base service that the Audit Trail Module uses to monitor object changes and log this information. You can use the static property to access this service and customize its behavior.
Initializes a new instance of the class with specified settings.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.AuditTrail.AuditTrailServiceBase.AddCustomAuditData(DevExpress.Xpo.Session,DevExpress.Persistent.AuditTrail.AuditDataItem)

summary.para: Adds custom data (information on events that are not audited) to the audit log.

member.param: A object.
An AuditDataItem object that contains custom data that should be added to the audit log.

Objects to be audited.
